title: Knicks, Don’t Do It!
description:
Jacoby begs the Knicks not to go all-in on a Donovan Mitchell trade. Then GM Jalen discusses a hypothetical trade between the Lakers and Nets that would see Kevin Durant & Kyrie Irving heading West. Zach Wilson is getting MVP buzz, and it doesn’t seem like it has anything to do with football. PLUS, we have a Kawhi Leonard sighting in the wild! The Clippers look like they’re ready to dominate this season. AND on some serious relationship advice on the pod-exclusive.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
